data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Stock Sinks As Market Gains: What You Should Know
data.text: In the latest trading session, Microsoft (MSFT) closed at $214.93, marking a -1.18% move from the previous day.

data.title: Microsoft announces quarterly earnings release date
data.text: REDMOND, Wash., Jan. 12, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Microsoft Corp. will publish fiscal year 2021 second-quarter financial results after the close of the market on Tuesday, Jan. 26, 2021, on the Microsoft Investor Relations website at https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/Investor/. data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) to Extend Azure Cloud to Verily's Terra Platform
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) is collaborating with Verily and Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard to foster biomedicine research through Terra platform.

data.title: Microsoft (MSFT) Introduces Surface Pro 7+ for Business
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) has released its new Surface Pro 7+ for Business personal computer, designed to facilitate remote work and learning.
